oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Potential of straw as bio-energy raw material in northern European countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pahkala, Katri
Kontturi, Markku
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this study, the current bioenergy potential of straw yield was estimated for North European countries (Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Latvia, Lithuania, Norway and Sweden) by using information about seed yield, seed dry matter (DM) content, harvest index and harvest losses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pahkala, Katri and Kontturi, Markku (2009) Potential of straw as bio-energy raw material in northern European countries. In: NJF Report, Vol 5, No 3, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, p. 56.
